name: Saving Love
description:
When one men falls sick to a very dangerous disease, his loved one will fight to the death to protect him and try to save him.

CONTROLS:

You can use left click in three different ways:

Left click  x 1sec: short shot.

Left click x 2secs: middle shot.

Left click x3 secs: long shot.

You have 3 lives. Make them count.

---------------------------------

Game made by: Marron121 and Laura Qwerty.

https://marron121.itch.io/

https://lauraqwerty.itch.io/

PS: There's a known issue where you won't die in the first level and instead go directly to the second level. This only happens in Webgl and after two hours we haven't found a way to fix it.

We call it the speedrun strat. You're welcome.
